column1: ...Snuck up on me there.\! ...How long have you been there?
column2: Menudo susto me has dado.\! ... ¿Cuánto rato llevas ahí?

column1: Aha, is that for me?\! Me like eat.
column2: Vaya, ¿es para mí?\! Me encanta comer.

column1: Heh...\| Yes, I've attempted to extend our supplies by using fewer base ingredients, while mixing in some local flora.
column2: Je, je...\| Sí, estoy intentando estirar las provisiones, usando menos ingredientes básicos y mezclándolos con la flora local.

column1: By Donar, you are too kind to me. You don't have to keep this up...
column2: Por Donar, agradezco tu generosidad. Pero no es necesario, de verdad...

column1: But my muscles do appreciate it.
...Yes big...\| I-I mean!!\| I'm sure they...
column2: Sí, son grand...\| ¡Q-quiero decir...!\| Seguro que...

column1: It's just...\| No, I don't mean to... It's just who you are... you're just a mystery to me.
column2: Es solo que...\| No, no pretendo... Es solo que eres... un misterio para mí.

column1: Mmhmm. I suppose, for your sake, I will have to convince myself that it is my "mysterious personality" that has you fixated.
column2: Ummm. Supongo que, por tu bien, tendré que convencerme de que lo que te obsesiona es mi «personalidad misteriosa».

column1: Heh... yeah.\| I shall now hide for the rest of my life. Good day.
column2: Je, je... Sí.\| Ahora me esconderé durante el resto del vida. Que tengas un buen día.
